name: Stranded (itch) (Developer's Society)
description:
It is the year 2051, you have been captured by a terrorist organization whose main objective is to brainwash and recruit young adults. Many attempts have been made to escape the facility in the past but none could make it out. The only way out is to go through the rooms which have a challenging puzzle to crack. Take too long and you die of starvation and dehydration. Do you have it in you to be the first survivor of this facility?

Game by: SV Sumanth
